location.name: London, London, City of obsolete, United Kingdom

title: Sales Development Representative (Bilingual - French)
content:
With millions of diners, tens of thousands of restaurants, and 23+ years of experience, OpenTable, part of Booking Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: BKNG), is an industry leader with a unique insight into the world of hospitality. We champion restaurants, bars, wineries, and other venues around the world, helping them attract guests, manage capacity, improve operations and maximize revenue.
 
Every employee at OpenTable has a tangible impact on what we do and how we do it. You’ll also be part of a global network that includes OpenTable and KAYAK's portfolio of travel brands including Swoodoo, checkfelix, momondo, Cheapflights, Mundi and HotelsCombined.
 
Hospitality is all about taking care of others, and it defines our culture. You’ll work in a welcoming and inclusive environment, and get the benefits, flexibility, and support you need to succeed.
 
OpenTable's Sales and Restaurant Services teams are dedicated to improving restaurants’ revenue potential by utilizing best in brand front-of-house management and online reservation technology. We are committed to helping our customers get the most out of our products, and we’re looking for a strategic-minded, willing to take action, and driven Sales Development Representative to join our team.
 
You will be part of a team of intelligent, passionate, and hardworking sales individuals who are intent on ensuring OpenTable's restaurant customers’ success and our dining customers’ enjoyment.
 
​Written and spoken fluency in French and English are requirements for this position. 
 
In this role, you will: 


Generate sales leads; Assist with sales prospecting on the phone to schedule appointments for Account Executives in their region.


Implement lead generation programs as they are developed by the Restaurant Marketing team.


Craft and distribute sales messages to restaurant prospects using traditional mailings and targeted email marketing.

Provide general sales support to UK & Germany sales teams; Ensure lead hand-offs to Account Executives are successful and exceed customer expectations. Respond to requests from prospects for additional product information

Keep management informed of all activity, including timely preparation of reports


Some travel required for market research and sales initiatives, as well as organizing, preparing for and attending regional trade shows.


 
Please apply if: 


You are Customer First with an ability to Nurture trust and confidence with customers


You understand and are capable of resolving current and future business needs - many times you exceed expectations by monitoring customer satisfaction


You continuously look for opportunities to improve service, follows through, solicits and applies feedback, and builds/maintains positive relations


You thrive on collaboration and partnership by demonstrating a commitment to team goals thru attitude, contribution, & collaboration


Your willingness to participate in a team shines through information sharing, openness to others' views, and accountability for own actions


Putting the success of team above own interest


Creativity and Innovation are strong skills you possess through developing approaches & ideas to achieve goals, solve problems, improve performance


Receptive to new ideas, methods, technologies - comfortable taking calculated risks to accomplish goals, meet challenges, and question conventional methods.


Grow with continuous improvement - Pursuing training & development while striving to continuously build knowledge, skills & abilities


Seeks & applies feedback to improve performance, demonstrates urgency/persistence, continually seeks to improve processes/products/services.


 
Desired:


Successful telesales or call-center track record with a track record of exceeding objectives.


Ability to multitask and work independently.


Strong computer and social skills; excellent time management skills.


Excellent PowerPoint and Excel skills.


Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.


Strong attention to detail.


Experience with Salesforce.com preferred.


Interest in the restaurant and hospitality sector.


 
Benefits:


Vacation: you will accrue 25 vacation days per year in addition to statutory UK Bank Holidays


One Celebration Day per calendar year


Private Health & Dental and Life Insurances


Employee Assistance Program (EAP)


Pension Fund


Gym Discount


Bike2Work


Season Loan Ticket


Reimbursable eye tests and 100 GBP contribution towards VDU glasses only


Perkbox & Booking.com business discounts


 
Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion
OpenTable aspires to be a workplace that reflects the diverse communities we serve and a culture that is inclusive and welcoming. Hiring people with different backgrounds, experiences, perspectives, and ideas is critical to innovation and to how we deliver great experiences for our users and our partners. Representation matters.
We ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform job responsibilities, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.

questions.label: How did you hear about this job?

questions.description: KAYAK Software Corporation, OpenTable, Inc., their respective subsidiaries and Momondo A/S (together, ‘KAYAK and OpenTable”, “our/we/us”, or “Company”) will process your personal data in accordance with applicable data protection laws for the purposes described in our privacy notice (Germany and All Other Locations). As part of the application process KAYAK and/or OpenTable may share your personal data across our group of companies, subject to our privacy notice and applicable laws.  In order to consider you for new positions, KAYAK and/or OpenTable may keep your personal data for 6 months (within the EU) and 2 years (in all other regions), unless otherwise required by applicable law.
